ORG_0000070 - organizational employor role

Label

organizational employor role

Definition

The role of an organization to employ a person

Definition source

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

Example

McDonalds once employed Jeff Bezos

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
